instructions: Heat wok and pour oil in.
Fry the peanuts until toasted and remove them from the wok.
Add shallots, pickled turnip, garlic and tofu and stir until they start to brown.
Cook rice noodles according to the package instructions. Drain the noodles and add to the wok. Stir quickly to keep things from sticking.
Add tamarind, sugar, fish sauce and chili pepper. Stir. Keep the heat on high.
Make room for the egg by pushing all noodles to the side of the wok. Crack the eggs onto the wok and scramble them until they are almost all cooked. Fold the egg mixture into the noodles.
The noodles should be soft and chewy. Pull a strand out and test. When you get the texture right, add the shrimp and stir.
Sprinkle white pepper around. Add bean sprouts and chives. Stir a few more times. The noodles should be soft, dry and very tangled.
cooking_tips: Ensure the noodles are cooked al dente for the best texture.
